sequel.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a book, film, play etc that continues the story of an earlier one, usually written or made by the same person
sequel.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: She’s writing a sequel to her first novel.
sequel.translation[0].definitions[1].def: an event that happens as a result of something that happened before
sequel.translation[1].definitions[0].def: a book, film, play etc that continues the story of an earlier one
sequel.translation[1].definitions[0].exa: His publisher is very optimistic about the sequel to the novel.
